about_the_game:
A steamy Visual Novel featuring HD graphics and realistic-looking characters, set in beautiful decor.
Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy. Episode 1 brings him to the local gay bar, to check it out and maybe make some friends, only to end up taking the cute bartender home after messing with him in the bar’s toilet.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.

EPISODE 1
Feeling lonely in his new apartment, Tony goes to the local gay bar to check it out and maybe make some friends. The few he had in this town left him along with his ex-husband after their ugly divorce.
He enters the bar expecting the loud frenzy atmosphere typical of large crowds, only to be met with the opposite: an ‘80s song playing low in the background, and not a single soul besides the twenty-something guy tending the bar.
Tired of being a couch potato, he grabs a seat and orders a beer, keeping the cute bartender company. After all, what’s there to lose, right?
- Only his dignity, as Luke is a total flirt and starts hitting on him relentlessly, ignoring Tony’s remarks about being too old for random bar hookups with a young man like him.

Will Luke convince Tony to let go of his past and embrace his new status?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!
